name: Childhood Fears (Demo)
description:
Do you remember being a kid? All the fun we would have, pretending to be knights fighting a dragon, or maybe a spy on a top-secret mission? Those were fun times. However, not everything was fun. We also had fears. Fears of things that might be hiding in the shadows. Fears of the monsters that could be hiding in the closet or under the bed. Not to worry though, that was just in our imaginations, right?

Version 1.0.1 bug fixes:

-"F For Flashlight" text no longer randomly appears

-Changed "Q To Hang Up" to "Q To Skip Instructions" for better understanding

-Phone call ring is a little quieter
